SQLChangeTrackingConfig.ChangeTrackingSQL: ALTER DATABASE {d} SET CHANGE_TRACKING = ON (CHANGE_RETENTION = 2 DAYS, AUTO_CLEANUP = ON);
SQLChangeTrackingConfig.ChangeTrackingTable: ALTER TABLE {d} ENABLE CHANGE_TRACKING  WITH (TRACK_COLUMNS_UPDATED = ON)
SQLChangeTrackingConfig.ChangeIncrementalSQL: select case changetb.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION WHEN 'D' THEN {SoftDelete} ELSE 1 END __rowMarker__ , changetb.{KeyColumn} , {OtherColumns} ,{AdditionalColumns} , convert(varchar(10),changetb.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION)  SYS_CHANGE_VERSION  , convert(varchar(10),changetb.SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION)  SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION, changetb.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM CHANGETABLE (CHANGES {t}, {h}) AS changetb left outer join {t} rowdata on changetb.{KeyColumn} = rowdata.{KeyColumn}
SQLChangeTrackingConfig.FullDataExtractQuery: select 0 __rowMarker__ , rowdata.{KeyColumn} , {OtherColumns} ,{AdditionalColumns} , convert(varchar(10),changetb.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION)  SYS_CHANGE_VERSION  , convert(varchar(10),changetb.SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION)  SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION, changetb.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM CHANGETABLE (CHANGES {t}, 0) AS changetb right outer join {t} rowdata on changetb.{KeyColumn} = rowdata.{KeyColumn}

SQLChangeTrackingConfig.FullDataExtractQuery: select 0 __rowMarker__ , rowdata.{KeyColumn} , {OtherColumns} ,{AdditionalColumns} , convert(varchar(10),changetb.SYS_CHANGE_VERSION)  SYS_CHANGE_VERSION  , convert(varchar(10),changetb.SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION)  SYS_CHANGE_CREATION_VERSION, changetb.SYS_CHANGE_OPERATION FROM CHANGETABLE (CHANGES {t}, 0) AS changetb right outer join {t} rowdata on changetb.{KeyColumn} = rowdata.{KeyColumn}
